socketedItems.secDescrText: Summons a Flame Golem that grants you increased Damage. The Flame Golem can use a fire spray, a wave of fire damage, and an explosive arcing projectile.
explicitMods: Can Summon up to 1 Golem at a time
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, making them less resistant to fire damage and giving them a chance to be ignited by fire damage.
explicitMods: Cursed enemies have -40% to Fire Resistance
Cursed enemies have +13% chance to be Ignited by Fire Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants fire resistance to you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies gain 39% additional Fire Resistance

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill that hits enemies, making those hits penetrate enemy fire resistance.
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Active Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Lob a fiery orb that explodes as it strikes the ground. The skill chains, releasing another fiery orb that repeats this effect.
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill with an area of effect, regardless of whether that skill deals damage.
explicitMods: Supported Skills deal 53% more Area Damage
Supported Skills have 30% less Area of Effect
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Active Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

or death for all. It was a risk Doryani was willing to take.

baseItem.name: Spine of the First Claimant
explicitMods: 40% increased Damage with Hits against Frozen Enemies
flavourText: Thousands gazed upon the doors of the great labyrinth,
at an Eternal Champion in steel and gold,
The first to challenge its treacherous traps.
To mark the occasion, Izaro had the Champion's remains gilded.

baseItem.name: Doon Cuebiyari
explicitMods: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 30 Iron Will
1% increased Damage per 8 Strength when in Main Hand
1% increased Armour per 16 Strength when in Off Hand
flavourText: My Iron heart will beat when yours is rust.
I take your Strength, your power, your lust.
By Iron Will alone I set my mind in motion.
Through endless storms of fervent devotion.
